mapper.insert: INSERT INTO video_progress ( progress_id, resource_id, student_id, last_position, total_watched, completion_rate, heatmap_data, last_watch_time, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{progressId}, #{video.resourceId}, #{student.studentId}, #{lastPosition}, #{totalWatched}, #{completionRate}, #{heatmapData}, #{lastWatchTime}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt} )
mapper.update: UPDATE video_progress SET last_position = #{lastPosition}, total_watched = #{totalWatched}, completion_rate = #{completionRate}, heatmap_data = #{heatmapData}, last_watch_time = #{lastWatchTime}, updated_at = #{updatedAt} WHERE progress_id = #{progressId}
mapper.select: SELECT vp.*, r.resource_id, r.name as resource_name, r.duration, s.student_id, s.name as student_name FROM video_progress vp JOIN resource r ON vp.resource_id = r.resource_id JOIN student s ON vp.student_id = s.student_id WHERE vp.resource_id = #{resourceId} AND vp.student_id = #{studentId}
